body.name: Bellivera Women Faux Leather Trench Coat Fleece-Lined Mid-length Jacket with Detachable Fur Collar
features: Warm and Comfortable: The soft pea coat can keep you warm and cozy. It will keep you elegant and comfy even in the cold spring, fall and winter. The waist has an adjustable wide waistband for the right amount of stretch. Very comfortable to wear. A belt at the Waist completes the sleek look and it will better fit.

Thicken: Winter pea coats for women. The trendy suede shell and furry lining are stronger, more windproof than traditional suede, and more importantly, more durable and affordable. The fluffy and fuzzy motorcycle pike jacket makes this womens overcoat stylish and cool.

Removable Faux Fur Collar: The detachable faux fur trim is soft and easy to connect and detach, which is very fashionable and lovely. Moto coats, long sleeve top, asymmetrical zipper closure. Great as Christmas, New Year, Thanksgiving, and Mother's Day gifts for family and friends.

Multipurpose: Pea jackets for women, cute windbreaker long-sleeve casual loose cardigan tops with lapels, front placket, and quality faux fur lining. Suitable for matching with jeans, sweaters, T-shirts, leggings, crop tops, black slacks, shorts, skinny pants, bodycon dress, vest, shacket, knee-high boots, or high heels.

Size Note: Please check your size with our size chart before purchasing. Due to monitor settings and pixel definitions, we cannot guarantee that the color you see on your screen is the exact product color. For fur collar care, pat gently or use a hairdryer (do not use very hot air) in the direction of the fur.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Happy with this coat
reviews.reviewText: My first purchase from this line. The faux suede texture is soft to touch, not worried of it ripping.The material is smooth. No teeth. Faux suede means many things. The coat is lined, same color fur.I purchased size Small. I wish I had purchased X-Small. it's not a deal breaker.My measurements, 5'5, 34/27/34, I don't own a scale. 120lbs ish, give or take.Length, it sets just above my knee. It's not cumbersome, it's a perfect length.The coat is sewn well. The main zipper is quality.I purchased Green. It's not emerald green. My eyes see Blue Spruce Pine. It has a shard of teal within it.The color is unique. I love it. The fur collar is easy on, easy off. The belt is a bit high for my liking.The fur collar is thick, lush, not too much, soft, no odor, lovely. The color is complimentary to the faux suede.I took off the belt The loop height is high up. The belt line doesn't offer a true fitted look. I put it back on, let it hang, so the belt loops aren't empty. This coat is Not for Cold Winter wear. Fall brisk days, Wear it, Yes.It's too lightweight to be considered a Winter Snow coat. It is a perfect coat for a Winter date night, in and out, it's not for walking in cold temps. I wore it day-time, I had to walk a mile. It was around 30 degrees. I froze my butt off.It's what I would call a car coat weight,slightly heavier, fur lining. It holds its shape well.What I do not like is the pockets. They are deep, but narrow to get your hand in.I fumble with my cell phone every time. My keys, it's a struggle to get them in and out of the pockets.Kinda bummed with the pockets. The pockets are zippered, dry skin, the zippers hurt.I went to TJ Max, I looked at all the brand name coats.99 % were simply thin, or copycat bubble puffy coats that Everyone wears, nope, No personality, I ignored the prices, not one coat appealed to me.I had been eyeing this coat for wks on Amaz.When I went to a local store, none could compare, I purchased this coat.I stare at it and smile. Something about this coat just makes me happy.It will wear well in the spring, minus the fur collar. Pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxury in a fun color
reviews.reviewText: The quality for the price was a nice surprise!I was expecting this coat to be thinner and more lightweight. It can handle a 40 degree day very nicely. I put it away once the temps hit the high 50's and low 60's in Spring, which was sad because the vibrant golden yellow lifted my spirits and stood out on a grey day. It has perfect finishing stitches and a super soft interior that feels nice when you put it on.The sleeves are lined but stitched down at the wrist, so it is not a hassle to get your arm through. The inside is a softer fabric that is colormatched exactly to the coat, so when you sling it over a chair or have it unzipped it looks fashionable and expensive.The fur on the collar is fun. I find it too hot and tight on my neck if I also have a scarf for my outfit and detach it on those days. It has matching buttons and elasticized hooks making is easy to put on or take off. Again, the buttons and fabric loops are color matched.I ordered the large and went through a Covid weight gain then loss. There is just enough give to handle some weight flux and the belt can cinch tighter if you lose weight. It was able to zip, without pulling, over my breasts and I am in the well endowed category. It was not tight but fitted on my curvy hips and "just" covered my rear when standing. (I am 5/6)The zippered pockets are deep enough for a large phone, car keys and lipstick, but you will break the line of the coat if you have all that in one pocket. (It will bulge out and you will lose fashion points.)It is dry clean only. I bought the golden color to cheer up my wintry day and people will spot you a mile away. It looks great with black, grey, brown and white. When I wore teal with it I couldn't walk anywhere without a compliment and people turning to look at me. It is a sharp look.This is one of my favorite clothing purchases of the year and I will be adding this coat in at least one more color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The warmest and softness coat to wear
reviews.reviewText: I love the fit it is true to size and the material is so soft, warm. The color is a soft pansy pink and the pockets are deep. Sure glad I gotten this coat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and soft
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is beautiful and soft. My only issue is it was too small for me. I very top heavy and could not close the jacket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm warm warm!
reviews.reviewText: Wore this to my son's outdoor wedding in the mountains. 22 degrees and snowing. Absolutely loved how warm it kept me. The fur collar is impressive. Comes just as pictured. Fluffy and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flock suede coat
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty coat with fur but did not fit comfortably on my daughter & she didn’t like the belt that went around.The belt had a small nip out of it towards the back but that wasn’t why I returned it. It wasn’t comfortable in it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Soft but Cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: The coat appears to be quality but when I put it on the bottom stitching puckers and roses in the back. You will constantly have to fix and check the position of the coat. The faux fur is soft and beautiful but the quality of the coat is below average for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love my coat it’s soft , long, and warm. Not to mention great for pictures. My only dislike is that it’s a little too big, so I should’ve sized down.

reviews.reviewTitle: I am so happy and satisfied with my purchase.
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the product. It’s beautiful, true to size. Thank you ♥️
Gute Qualität, schaut gut aus, es ist sehr warm und komfortabel

Très beau manteau,confortable et chaud. texture agréable au toucher manches un peu longue mais je vais faire un petit ourlet sans problème. Le manteau est aussi très bien sans fourrure . La couleur jaune est proche d'une jolie couleur moutarde pas d'un jaune vif. La ceinture est un peu longue mais je la repasse une deuxième fois autour de la boucle et elle tient bien . Je reste satisfaite de cet achat. Je vous le recommande
